description: Keep it low-key in the Men's Piste Hoody. A blend of cotton and polyester for comfort, this hooded sweatshirt is washed for a soft-hand feel. Pull on the attached jersey-lined hood and cinch the flat-knitted drawcords when the temps drop post-sunset. Stow small items in the kangaroo pocket. The front graphic features our logo and scenery that'll inspire you to hit the slopes.
name: Marmot Piste Hoody - Mens
